pages.text: $(thing)Deer$() are a common, passive creature found across all the $(thing)Climate Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$(). They have three varieties - Doe, Stag and Rudolph - with Stags identifiable by their $(item)Antlers$(), and Rudolphs by their red noses.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Deer$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be bred with $(item)Wheat$() like many other livestock.

pages.name: Deer
pages.drop1: mysticalworld:venison{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-2", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill", "Cooks if killed while on Fire"]}}
pages.drop2: minecraft:leather{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 0-1", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}
pages.drop3: mysticalworld:antlers{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 1", "Unaffected by Cutting Skill", "Only from Stags"]}}
